name: My trip of 2015 Google Summer of Code
body:
### My GSoC trip
I'm glad to have a chance to join 2015 Google Summer of Code, and this is my first time to join it.

During these three month, I will contribute to a project called **self-hosted online communities communication with OTR encryption** with an Indian girl, my mentors and some other people from FOSSASIA.

### This blog is for what?
This page is used to illustrate my idea and conclude my work every Friday from this week.

So, let's begin!!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
